      • extractAndDecodeAuthHeader

        public static String[] extractAndDecodeAuthHeader(String header,
                                                  String credentialsCharset)
        Decodes the header into a username and password. throws BadCredentialsException or IllegalArgumentException if the Basic header is not present or is not valid Base64.
        Parameters:
        header - header
        credentialsCharset - charset
        Returns:
        [username, password]
